author: admin
title: FastSpring Celebrates 10th Anniversary
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 11:43 AM   FastSpring 
SANTA BARBARA, Calif., Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Award-winning digital e-commerce and subscription management leader FastSpring ( FastSpring.com ) is celebrating an important milestone: Its 10(th) anniversary. Founded in 2005, FastSpring has grown steadily throughout the decade to become a leading provider in its field, now supporting over 2,500 companies worldwide. 
To celebrate 10 years in business, FastSpring will be launching a promotional and social media campaign saluting some of its longest-standing and best-known customers. FastSpring clients include a rich and diverse array of companies and customers of all kinds, from small businesses to internationally recognized brands like Adobe, SmithMicro, Toshiba, The American Heart Association, Random House, MacPaw , and hundreds more. The company powers the sales for software, SaaS, and digital content of all kinds, helping companies to gain entrance to new markets through e-commerce--and the new customers they need to thrive and grow. 
"FastSpring is proud and delighted to be celebrating its 10(th) anniversary," comments FastSpring CEO Chris Lueck . "No matter where they are, our unique platform empowers our clients to reach consumers and businesses around the world, and in convenient local payment methods. We're delighted to be supporting more customers than ever in achieving their visions, and are even more excited about what the next ten years have in store for us at FastSpring." 
10-Year Milestones 
Headquartered in Santa Barbara, California, FastSpring has grown steadily from its founding to 60 employees as of 2015, with approximately 2,500 clients reaching over 3,600,000 customers in 240 countries worldwide. 
In its 10(th) year, FastSpring has also continued to increase its presence and support for developers across both Mac and PC platforms. The company's industry event sponsorships in 2015 include MacITConf, AltConf, sfMacIndie , and others. Meanwhile, FastSpring's many accolades over its first decade include Stevie Awards (four separate honors as of Summer 2015), CODie Awards, and inclusion in the Inc. 500, Deloitte Technology Fast 500 , and Software Magazine Top 500 lists. 
About FastSpring 
FastSpring provides a highly acclaimed, all-in-one e-commerce, subscription management and billing platform that's specifically designed to meet the needs of software, SaaS, and other online service companies. FastSpring creates a seamless, fully branded purchasing experience that accomplishes a variety of crucial services, including: leveraging tools that increase client revenues across all customer touchpoints; gathering key customer-centric data, leveraging multiple payment methods, global currencies and languages; offering intelligent gateway routing logic for optimum card acceptance; managing fraud/chargebacks, sales tax and VAT collection; robust reporting; and providing an award-winning 24/7 client service experience. To find out more, please visit www.FastSpring.com . 
For more information about FastSpring, please contact Christina O'Toole, at (805) 259-3557 or cotoole@FastSpring.com .
